titles.title: To expand the boundaries of the Little River Canyon National Preserve in the State of Alabama.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.

bill.summary:
2/25/2008--Introduced.
Amends the Little River Canyon National Preserve Act of 1992 to modify the boundary of the Little River Canyon National Preserve in Alabama to include additional land in the Preserve.
